channel.title: Deltascape help? NOT THE ANTI-LEECH!
channel.description: Hey guys i need help with deltascape source. i have done a quest well by taking every position and ect... and i having problem with dialog... i can't make a choice point meaning.. [code] case 9: choice("Yes, I want to keep my bank safe!", "No, I might forget it."); break;[/code] this code uses for pin.. and if choice 1 it open pin list if choice 2 it close the dialog.. i mad this [code]choice("Yes.", "No."); break;[/code] when i do it if i presses yes or no nothin happend how i make it happend... hope you help me!! i compiled and it work.. when i go to choose nothing happend

item.title: Deltascape help? NOT THE ANTI-LEECH!
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

First option - Packet 9157
Second option - Packet 9158

if (NpcDialogue == 9) {
//What happens here
//WRX`
}

^ Use that in both packets, just remember to change what it does.

item.title: Deltascape help? NOT THE ANTI-LEECH!
item.dc:creator: @angel_in_war angel in war
item.description:
@angel_in_war wrote:

Hey guys i need help with deltascape source.
i have done a quest well by taking every position and ect…
and i having problem with dialog… i can’t make a choice point
meaning…

case 9: choice("Yes, I want to keep my bank safe!", "No, I might forget it."); break;
this code uses for pin… and if choice 1 it open pin list if choice 2 it close the dialog…
i mad this

choice("Yes.", "No."); break;
when i do it if i presses yes or no nothin happend how i make it happend…
hope you help me!!
i compiled and it work…
when i go to choose nothing happend
